From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

It's Ignatius not Iguanis.


Ignatius woke up to find himself in the CR chamber. His wounds were healing
successfully and he'd soon be ready to fight. He looked outside seeing the
other three chambers were empty. The Eaglebot stretched his wings far as he
could inside the cramped tank. He didn't know what happened he just knew
that things were either better than he thought or as bad as he had feared.
"Computer, who is present in this base?" he asked softly almost hoping it
wouldn't respond.

"Slayer is scanning on the bridge." it responded in an echoing mettalic tone
fit for the voice of a hollow unfealing machine.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2001 7:30 AM
Subject: Re: Repaired and Searching


> ::Slayer::
>
> Slayer looks over the scan results, frowning. This was definetly not
> good. Prebon seemed to be stationary and functioning, but the unknown
> bots moving Blaze and Bullet could pose a problem. He'd have to deal
> with that later; Prebon was top priority for now.
>
> Slayer walks back to the CR area, checking on Iguanus's status. As
> soon as the bot was out of the CR, Slayer would go get Prebon, and
> perhaps Blaze and Bullet as well, though that would have to wait.
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > The TRainer ship opens a full scan of the planet looking for the
> leader. It
